column5: I have similar experience not with my therapist but with my friends... nearly all my friends say when I talk about my mental problems and my childhood trauma I seem like talking about others, and they cant tell from my daily behavior that I have those mental problem as severe as I said... which sometimes make me suspicious about my feelings...

>ruly bad people dont lie awake at night worrying that they are bad people.

I am crying now, moved by your words. Thank you so much.
